Bend.George Palmer and Dorothy Binney Putnam:
The George Palmer and Dorothy Binney Putnam House is a historic house located at 606 NW Congress Street in Bend, Oregon.


== Description and history ==
The house is a one-and-a-half story, single-family residence in the American Craftsman style. Retaining its original character and charm, a majority of the historic fabric in the house is intact.
